task.title: Accessing the Application
task.shortdesc: To apply for a Fulton County Library card you must first complete an online application.

taskbody.prereq:
To access the library card application you must:
Have a valid email address
Avoid using an email you may lose access to in the future such as a school or work email address
Access to the internet
If you do not have access to the internet at home, you can visit your local library branch to complete the application onsite.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Fulton County Library home page: www.fulcolibrary.org
Select Services from the top menu bar.

image.alt: Image: Top menu bar from the Fulton County Library home page with the services tab highlighted.

step.stepresult: A drop down menu should appear when you click.

step.cmd: Select Library Cards from the dropdown menu.

image.alt: Image: Services drop down listing a variety of subpages, with the library card subpage highlighted.

step.stepresult: This link will bring you to the "Library Cards and Circulation Information" page.

step.cmd: Click the image under the "Get a Library Card" callout on the righthand side of the page

info.note: You must click the image, not the heading, to activate the link.

image.alt: Image: The top portion of the Library Cards and Circulation Information page with a sidebar titled Get a Library Card highlighted.

taskbody.result: You should now have reached the online application portal.
